limit_zipcode.label: Limit to zipcodes
limit_zipcode.note:
Each rule should be separated with new line, comma or semicolon.
Possible rules:
1) Simple glob expression
     SK6????
     SK6+
     SK6 12*
2) Range
     90000-91000
3) Exact value
     90210

vendor_po_grid_sortdir.label: Default shipment sort direction in vendor interface

vendor_po_grid_status_filter.label: Default shipment status filter in vendor interface

portal_show_totals.label: Show totals in vendor portal order view

shipping_tax_in_shipping.label: Include shipping tax in shipping amount

endicia_new_pass_phrase.label: New Pass Phrase
endicia_new_pass_phrase.note: Entering new passpharse will issue Endicia ChangePassPhraseXML API call

endicia_balance_threshold.label: Balance Threshold
endicia_balance_threshold.note: Leave empty to disable automatic funding of the account

fedex_itn.label: ITN (Internal Transaction Number)
fedex_itn.note:
For shipments requiring an EEI/SED, enter the ITN number received from AES when you filed your shipment or the FTR (Foreign Trade Regulations) exemption number.
Proper format: AES XYYYYMMDDNNNNNN where YYYYMMDD is date and NNNNNN are numbers generated by the AES.
Apply at http://www.aesdirect.gov

local_if_in_stock.label: When in stock use local, otherwise use vendor

udropship.title: Drop Shipping
udropship.specificerrmsg: This shipping method is currently unavailable. If you would like to ship using this shipping method, please contact us.
